title: Garden Tomato Basil
description: Fresh cherry tomatoes, basil leaves, and mozzarella cheese on tomato sauce.

title: Mediterranean Veggie
description: Loaded with black olives, spinach, red peppers, and feta cheese.

title: Classic Pepperoni
description: A classic favorite with plenty of pepperoni slices and extra cheese.

title: Garlic Shrimp Scampi
description: Topped with garlic shrimp, parsley, and a splash of lemon.

title: Margherita
description: Simple and delicious with tomato sauce, fresh white cheese, and basil.

title: Italian Salami Supreme
description: Salami, sliced red onions, and mushrooms on a crispy crust.
